title: Waka Waka
lyrics:
[intro] (C)
 
(C) You're a good soldier (G) choosing your battles
(Am) Pick yourself up and dust yourself (F)off and back in the saddle
(C) You're on the frontline (G) everyone's watching
(Am) You know it's serious, we're getting (F)closer, this isn’t over
(C) The pressure is on (G) you feel it
(Am) But you've got it all (F) believe it
 
(C)When you fall get up, oh oh
And (G)if you fall get up, eh eh
(Am)Tsamina mina zangalewa
(F) 'Cause this is Africa
 
[chorus]
(C)Tsamina mina, eh eh (G)waka waka, eh eh
(Am)Tsamina mina zangalewa (F) this time for Africa
 
[interlude - kazoo] (C)  (G)  (Am)  (F)  x2
 
(C) Listen to your god (G) this is our motto
(Am) Your time to shine, don’t wait in (F)line, Y vamos por todo
(C) People are raising (G) their expectations
(Am) Go on and feed them, this is your (F)moment, no hesitations
(C) Today's your day (G) I feel it
(Am) You paved the way (F) believe it
 
If (C)you get down, get up, oh oh
When (G)you get down, get up, eh eh
(Am)Tsamina mina zangalewa
(F) This time for Africa
 
[chorus]
(C)Tsamina mina, eh eh (G)waka waka, eh eh
(Am)Tsamina mina zangalewa (F) anawa ah ah
(C)Tsamina mina, eh eh (G)waka waka, eh eh
(Am)Tsamina mina zangalewa (F) this time for Africa
 
A(C)wela majoni biggie biggie mamma (G)one A to Z
Bathi (Am)tsu zala majoni biggie biggie mamma (F)from East to West
Batsi, (C)waka waka ma, eh eh (G)waka waka ma, eh eh
(Am)Zonke zizwe mazi buye (F-stop) 'Cause this is Africa
 
[interlude]
[echo] (C) frica - frica ([girls] Eeeh-eh-eh-eh-eh-eh)
(G) (eh-eh)
[boys] (Am) Tsamina mina ([girls]Eeeh-eh-eh-eh-eh-eh)
[boys] (F) Anawa ah ah
 
[boys] (C) Tsamina mina (girls] Eeeh-eh-eh-eh-eh-eh)
(G) (eh-eh)
[boys] (Am) Tsamina mina (girls] Eeeh-eh-eh-eh-eh-eh)
[boys] (F) Anawa ah ah
 
[chorus, all]
(C)Tsamina mina, eh eh (G)waka waka, eh eh
(Am)Tsamina mina zangalewa (F) anawa ah ah
(C)Tsamina mina, eh eh (G)waka waka, eh eh
(Am)Tsamina mina zangalewa (F) this time for Africa
 
[outro]
(C)Django, eh eh (G)Django, eh eh
(Am)Tsamina mina zangalewa (F) anawa ah ah
(C)Django, eh eh (G)Django, eh eh
(Am)Tsamina mina zangalewa (F) anawa ah ah
 
(C) (G) This time for Africa
(Am) (F) This time for Africa
[spoken] (C) We're all Africa (G)
(Am) We're all Africa (F)
(C-single strum) [end]
